title: Opinion: STAT readers respond on the ethics of gender-affirming care for minors, the new food pyramid, and more
description: Authors of HHS report criticize recent STAT op-ed on gender-affirming care for minors for using “scare tactics.”
content: Authors of HHS report criticize recent STAT op-ed on gender-affirming care for minors for using “scare tactics.”
